sn42.2:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn42.2:4.2: Atha kho tālapuṭo naṭagāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn42.2:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho tālapuṭo naṭagāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.2:4.5: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ naṭānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.2:4.6: ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.2:4.10: Dutiyampi kho tālapuṭo naṭagāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.2:4.11: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ naṭānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.2:4.12: ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.2:4.16: Tatiyampi kho tālapuṭo naṭagāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.2:4.17: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ naṭānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.2:4.18: ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.2:5.1: “Addhā kho tyāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, na labhāmi:
sn42.2:5.2: ‘alaṃ, gāmaṇi, tiṭṭhatetaṃ, mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī’ti.
sn42.2:5.4: Pubbe kho, gāmaṇi, sattā avītarāgā rāgabandhanabaddhā.
sn42.2:5.5: Tesaṃ naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhammā rajanīyā te upasaṃharati bhiyyoso mattāya.
sn42.2:5.6: Pubbe kho, gāmaṇi, sattā avītadosā dosabandhanabaddhā.
sn42.2:5.7: Tesaṃ naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhammā dosanīyā te upasaṃharati bhiyyoso mattāya.
sn42.2:5.8: Pubbe kho, gāmaṇi, sattā avītamohā mohabandhanabaddhā.
sn42.2:5.9: Tesaṃ naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhammā mohanīyā te upasaṃharati bhiyyoso mattāya.
sn42.2:5.10: So attanā matto pamatto pare madetvā pamādetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāso nāma nirayo tattha upapajjati.
sn42.2:5.12: ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti, sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi.
sn42.2:5.13: Micchādiṭṭhikassa kho panāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, purisapuggalassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi—
sn42.2:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, tālapuṭo naṭagāmaṇi parodi assūni pavattesi.
sn42.2:6.5: “Nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ rodāmi yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāha;
sn42.2:6.6: api cāhaṃ, bhante, pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi naṭehi dīgharattaṃ nikato vañcito paluddho:
sn42.2:6.7: ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’”ti.
sn42.2:6.9: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn42.2:6.12: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn42.2:6.13: Labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
sn42.2:6.14: Alattha kho tālapuṭo naṭagāmaṇi bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
